Classes in translator.minionExpressionTranslator used by translator

Classes in translator.minionExpressionTranslator used by translator.minionExpressionTranslator
AtomExpressionTranslator
          Translates simple expressions, which are AtomicExpressions (booleans, numbers, identifiers) or NonAtomicExpressions (vector- or matrixelements).
ExpressionRepresentation
           
MinionTranslatorGlobals
           
MulopExpressionTranslator
          Translates arithmetic and boolean expressions such as additions, substractions, disjunctions etc containing NO relations (=, <, ...) !
RelationalExpressionTranslator
          Translate relational expressions containing either boolean or arithemtic expressions.
SpecialExpressionTranslator
          Translates top-level binary expressions into rather smart Minion constraints: it can translate scalar products (simple sums and weighted sums), partwise scalar products and simple binary expressions that consist of at least one atom.
SubexpressionCollection
           
TranslationUnsupportedException
